\newcommand{\ottdruleidXXapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{(I}  \ottsym{t)}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{t}}{%
{\ottdrulename{id\_app}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleselXXapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{((K}  \ottsym{t)}  \ottsym{t')}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{t}}{%
{\ottdrulename{sel\_app}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubXXapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{(((S}  \ottsym{t)}  \ottsym{t')}  \ottsym{t'')}  \longrightarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t} \, \ottnt{t''}  \ottsym{)} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t'} \, \ottnt{t''}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{sub\_app}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulectxXXappXXfun}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ctx\_app\_fun}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnreduce}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}$}{\ottcom{$\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}$ reduces to $\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}$}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleidXXapp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleselXXapp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubXXapp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulectxXXappXXfun{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}
